item.title: Don't overcomplicate your web resume creation
item.description: Introduction In today’s world, having your website is not only a great way to showcase your work but also a way to make yourself more visible. In my case, I wanted a platform to share my thoughts and projects with others. I had around five failed attempts to start this project. Once, I tried using Python and Django, then Php with Laravel, and Php with Symfony. In all these attempts, I always ended up in the same place, overcomplicating things when it wasnâ€™t necessary.
